Name: Élysée Treaty
Ingredients: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Cognac-laced, zesty and bittersweet. Delicious as a late-night after-dinner digestive.
History: Created in 2015 by Ivan Mandaric at Oxbo Urban Bar & Grill, DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel, Zagreb, Croatia.
